description.full: Want to be the life of the party and play over 90 unique mixes of Hip-Hop, Electronica, Pop, Rock, and more? Well, you can only do it in DJ Hero™! The newest music gaming experience lets you spin on a state-of-the-art DJ Hero™ Turntable Controller, including a 360 degree rotating turntable platter, crossfader, and effects dial. You can be the host with the most in your own living room, or invite a friend to plug in a Guitar Hero® Guitar Controller and get the party started. You can even take the party online to showcase your skills!
